product_name: Mountain Hardwear Chiller Wide Brim Hat - Women's
long_description: Keeping you shielded from the hot sun, the Mountain Hardwear Chiller wide brim hat actively cools your head for continued comfort while traveling or hiking in warm weather. Breathable stretch nylon offers lightweight durability and comfortable fit. Cool.Q(TM) ZERO mesh side panels provide immediate cooling thanks to sweat-activated cooling polymers embedded in the fabric that help lower the fabric's temperature. Integrated UPF 50+ sun protection continuously guards against harmful ultraviolet rays. 4 in. brim of the Mountain Hardwear Chiller wide brim hat folds up and packs down for easy carrying. Drawcord under chin allows for a secure, customized fit.
